card.name: Punish Hold
card.text: ■ Strike Back ■ Choose up to 2 of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap them.

card.name: Dandy Nasuo
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. Put a card from your deck into your mana zone, and then put a card from your mana zone into your graveyard. Then shuffle your deck.

card.name: Sandal, Spirit Knight
card.text: ■ When you put a creature into the battle zone, you may return one of your Arc Seraphims or Wild Veggies from your mana zone to your hand.

card.name: Assault Champion
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, each of your other Arc Seraphims and Beast Folk in the battle zone get +3000 power and "double breaker" until the End Step

card.name: Farmahat, Holy Emperor
card.text: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Arc Seraphims. ■ Meteorburn—Whenever an opponent's creature attacks, you may put a card under this creature into your graveyard. This creature untaps and gets "blocker" until the End Step ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Reverse Cyclone
card.text: ■ Cyclone ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it.

card.name: Ragmal, Spirit Knight
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your creatures in the battle zone and put it into your mana zone. Then your opponent chooses one of their creatures in the battle zone and puts it into its owner's mana zone.

card.name: Saiya, Spirit Knight
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack players.
